headline: 2 Under-the-Radar Stocks With Market-Beating Potential
summary: Let's take a look at two iconic American companies whose stocks have shown that a simple business model and savvy management are enough to post market-beating results.  First up is Visa (NYSE: V).  To me, Visa is the Rodney Dangerfield of stocks -- it gets no respect.
